resources.string: Type \"Call [contact name]\" to call a contact!
No need to search apps in app-drawer!
Type \"Open [app name]\" to open an installed app!
Ask Jarvis to set reminders and he would make sure that you would\'nt forget anything.
Jarvis would listen to you and respond, anytime you want.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> clear data
Are you sure you want to exit?
Are you sure you want to clear chat history?
Do you want to delete this message?
